hypothesis_content.title: Post-News Volatility Compression Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: Following a significant crypto news event (as flagged by a news sentiment API with magnitude >0.7), a sharp, high-volume price move (>3% within 2 hours) will be followed by a period of volatility compression (Bollinger Bandwidth 4h < 0.5). A breakout from this compression in the direction of the initial news-driven move within the next 24 hours offers a high-probability continuation trade.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Major news creates a 'price discovery' spike. The subsequent compression represents market digestion and consensus-building. A breakout from this tight range suggests the consensus has formed in favor of the initial news impulse, leading to a efficient, directional move as late participants enter.
entry_conditions: BTC/ETH experiences >3% move within 2 hours of spike on >20% above avg volume
Price breaks above/below the high/low of the compression candle range

exit_conditions.take_profit: 1.5x the width of the compression range (measured from breakout point)
exit_conditions.time_exit: 24 hours after entry if TP/SL not hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If the breakout from compression fails more than 60% of the time (reverts back into the range) or leads to a move less than 0.8x the range width over 50% of instances.
